title: Emerald & Polki Diamond Raasi Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (Polki Vajjralu). Featuring a rich Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Raasi Haaram showcases a floral vine design, meticulously handcrafted with vibrant emeralds and sparkling polki diamonds. The pendant boasts a cascading cluster of emeralds and polkis, finished with delicate diamond drops (Gutapusalu). The intricate settings highlight the natural beauty of each gemstone, reflecting traditional South Indian craftsmanship (Pachikam)
colors: complemented by the rich green of the emeralds and the warm white of the polki diamonds. A classic and auspicious color palette.
occasions: or any grand occasion. A treasured heirloom piece for generations.
description: A symbol of tradition and prosperity, this Raasi Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South India. The use of natural emeralds and polki diamonds ensures exceptional quality and enduring value. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, this piece is a testament to the art of fine jewelry making. A statement piece that will be cherished for generations.
